description:
Glide effortlessly across technical terrain. Move with speed and confidence. Travel fast and far. This is the freedom of superlight trail running. Comfortable, breathable and durable, the Norvan SL 2 is one of the lightest trail running shoes made. The hydrophobic, hardwearing TPU mesh upper easily folds down for packability, and the Vibram® Megagrip outsole utilizes LITEBASE technology to deliver durable performance across a range of conditions while shedding every gram possible.

Updates include lighter weight Vibram® LITEBASE technology, a revised upper to minimize friction and improve flexibility, a redesigned collar to prevent debris entry, and a more resilient midsole compound.
name: Arcteryx Norvan SL 2 - Mens
